item.title: Custom Quest
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Pblord7, post:3, topic:371856”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=467923.msg3421051#msg3421051 date=1291515023]
So, you want it to be able to complete the quest, without the item…?

You make no sense…
[/quote]
Atm once you complete it, it deletes the diary, but if you talk to him again its not complete.

I want it so once it deletes the diary its automatically complete[/quote]

What the fuck are you asking?

Right now it looks like it deletes the diary and makes q12 equal to 15?

What exactly are you aiming for?

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Quest
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

I need help with my quest, it only says that I completed it when I have the item with me… Can someone Help me?

if(q12 == 0 && playerHasItem(2408)){
deleteItem(2408, 1);
				showInterface(297);
				sendQuest("You have completed The Witch's House", 301);
				q12 = 15;
				sendQuest("@gre@The Witch's House", 7342);
				sM("Go talk to Hans! I can now go to cyclops!");
}
}

Read full topic
